scripts.docker-run: docker-compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml build && docker-compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml up -d
scripts.docker-run:dev: docker-compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml build && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d
